title: Support for async/await
body:
Closes:

* [update to std::future::Future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/140).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_storage_table to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/164).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_storage_blob to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/165).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_storage_account to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/166).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_cosmos to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/168).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_service_bus to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/167).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_core to std::future](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/169).
* [Migrate azure_sdk_auth_aad to std::future dependency](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/170).

title: Suggestions For Auth Async PR
body:
* updated the `non_interactive` example as well
* dropped some extra unwrap -> wraps
* added a JSON deserialize impl for LoginResponse that just re-uses the `FromStr`, so you can call `.json()` on the login request

title: add stream_query_entities_fullmetadata
body: fix #148. The metadata is required to preserve the types.

title: Added create_collection builder
body: Fixes #152.

title: Support for generating storage SAS URLs
body:
Fixes #147.

Duplicate of [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/pull/158](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/pull/158). I'll merge both and leave to the community to choose which is best.

title: Working implementation of sas builder
body:
Hello,  I just wanted to propose this as an incomplete implementation of the Azure shared authorization signature protocol.  This code only supports the latest version of the protocol, and only generates signed urls for blobs.  I use this code currently in a work project, and suppose that it should be relatively easy to expand to support files and tables if the idea is acceptable to you.

An example usage is included in the PR.

title: Allow to specify fixed performance levels
body: Solves #151.

title: replaced curl with reqwest
body: Solves https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/155.

title: CosmosDB end to end tests
body:
Related issues: #21 #22 

Hi!
Awesome work you have done with this project!
I wanted to get a little started and saw those two issues still open and they are like the perfect starting place for getting to know the project.
And this was also just a perfect issue for Hacktoberfest.

I hope this helps a little. Feel free to comment on every dumb thing I did :smile:

title: Update headers
body:
The headers used for setting `Cache-Control` and `Content-Disposition`
should be the ones specific to Azure blob settings.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/put-blob#request-headers-all-blob-types

title: Add stream_query_entities
body:
I need to be able to stream the table query results #143. This is an attempt to add the function and support. I think I'm down to some lifetime errors and parsing the headers. 

3 lifetime errors look like this:
```
Camerons-MacBook-Pro:AzureSDKForRust cameron$ cargo build
   Compiling azure_sdk_storage_table v0.20.3 (/Users/cameron/rs/AzureSDKForRust/azure_sdk_storage_table)
error: cannot infer an appropriate lifetime
   --> azure_sdk_storage_table/src/table/mod.rs:139:50
    |
137 |       ) ->  impl Stream<Item = T, Error = AzureError> {
    |             ----------------------------------------- this return type evaluates to the `'static` lifetime...
138 | 
139 |           stream::unfold(ContinuationState::Start, move |cont_state| {
    |  __________________________________________________^
140 | |             let cont = match cont_state {
141 | |                 ContinuationState::Start => None,
142 | |                 ContinuationState::Next(Some(cont)) => Some(cont),
...   |
156 | |             }))
157 | |         })
    | |_________^ ...but this borrow...
    |
note: ...can't outlive the anonymous lifetime #2 defined on the method body at 133:5
   --> azure_sdk_storage_table/src/table/mod.rs:133:5
    |
133 | /     pub fn stream_query_entities<T: DeserializeOwned>(
134 | |         &self,
135 | |         table_name: &str,
136 | |         query: Option<&str>,
...   |
158 | |         .flatten()
159 | |     }
    | |_____^
help: you can add a constraint to the return type to make it last less than `'static` and match the anonymous lifetime #2 defined on the method body at 133:5
    |
137 |     ) ->  impl Stream<Item = T, Error = AzureError> + '_ {
    |           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

title: add count_blobs example
body:
I wrote this example to see how to page through the results with the next marker. It pages through the results and returns the total count of blobs.

To test it, I ran a [create_blobs.rs](https://gist.github.com/ctaggart/8b86ce938943443ebd85f4a7aa74ca4f) to populate a container with something more than 5000 results so that it would be forced to page.

title: More append blob support
body:
Back for more! (#138) This adds conditional header support to PUT append blob, and creates the append block operation for append blobs. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/append-block

I can split this up if needed.

title: a TableService example that lists all the tables
Getter/setters
body: Export DocumentAttributes's ID as getter/setter (see issue [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/137](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/137)).

title: Conditional header support for PUT block blob
body: There are plenty of other operations that this applies to, too. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/storageservices/specifying-conditional-headers-for-blob-service-operations#Subheading2

title: Fixed clippy issues
body:
Fixes issue [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/135](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/135).

**Breaking changes**:

1. In Cosmos crate, renamed the function `is_upsert` in `upsert` since it took a mutable reference of self.
2. In AAD crate, moved function `from_str` from `impl LoginResponse` to `impl FromStr for LoginResponse` (the logic is the same, you just need to have the trait imported).

title: FIX: China Cosmos DB Base Uri Port
Split into crates
body: As per [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/132](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/132).

title: Support for custom URI in Cosmos
First implementation of AAD auth
body: First implementation of interactive and client AAD auth to be used in AAD based methods (Authorization token).

body: Fix link to examples folder, make it point inside the sub-crate that matches the inline code.

body: As suggested by [bmc-msft](https://github.com/bmc-msft) in [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/120](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/120).

title: Add Use Multiple Write Locations to all Cosmos requests to match JS SDK
body:
As per https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cosmos-db/how-to-manage-database-account#configure-clients-for-multi-homing

and 
https://github.com/Azure/azure-cosmos-js/blob/master/src/request/request.ts#L174
and 
https://github.com/Azure/azure-cosmos-js/blob/master/src/common/constants.ts#L159

title: Cosmos: Added the option to add the partition key header on document delete
body: Cosmos: Added the option to add the partition key header on document

title: Feature/add parallelize cross partition query
body:
For Cosmos DB enables

x-ms-documentdb-query-parallelizecrosspartitionquery

on Queries

title: Cosmos DB: better query support
body:
- support different parameter types (arrays, numbers, etc.) utilizing serde_json::Value
- support by-value and by-ref values in query parameters.
- make query creation zero cost over its content.

title: &str for headers, up dependencies
body:
- use `AsRef<str>` instead of `String` for request header values where value will likely be less than 31 byte (https://carllerche.github.io/bytes/bytes/struct.Bytes.html#inline-bytes)
- refresh dependencies

title: Add support for SAS token based authentication (#110).
body: Implementation for #110

title: Remove println when streaming blob
body:
This is just a trivial PR to remove a `println!` that must have been forgotten while developing!
It stuck somewhere in the `BlobStreamBuilder` and prevents from outputting anything to stdout.
Thanks

title: Added support for Azure storage emulator
body:
This is another proposed solution for the Azure emulator support. It's pretty much the same code by [arnodb](https://github.com/arnodb)'s PR (available here [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/pull/105](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/pull/105)) so all the credit goes to him.

It does not break compatibility and it is behind a compile-time feature (so you don't pay the price of it outside development). Enable it with ```cargo run --features=emulator```.

I've also taken the time to remove one unnecessary String allocation.

title: Updating dependencies
body:
new versions of md5, hyper-tls, uuid.
generally switching to x.x versions.

title: Url encoded blob storage uris
body: Solves [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/98](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/98).

title: adding information about connection fields
body: Adding information about connection fields. I think this would help new users, by avoiding doubt like I had in #99.

title: Fix README example
body:
- Fixed a warning
- Fixed a bunch of errors
- Applied `rustfmt` (nightly)

Verified that it works with my CosmosDB account

title: v1 Storage support for blobs
body:
This pr modifies the `AccessTier` field of a blob to be Optional because v1 does not return it in the list_blobs XML unless it' explicitly set first.
v2 returned the field regardless along with the `AccessTierInferred` field (also optional). 

This should address [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/78](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/78) but I haven't checked it thoroughly. Since I will keep working on v2 please open issues in case of problems.

title: Replaced println! with trace! or debug!
body: This should fix [https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/76](https://github.com/MindFlavor/AzureSDKForRust/issues/76).
